segments.text: What should be put in my education background ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are expected to write the educational experience about your high school and college , even the time span .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean by ' job intentions ' ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Job intentions refer to the kind of job you are eager to get , for example , accounting , marketing .
segments.speaker: S2
